availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Calhoun, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Married Martha J. Watkins. Father of Lloyd Watkins. Physician in McLean County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoon, p. 37. Find A Grave, "Dr. Austin F. Watkins (1829-1892)," Memorial #5276254, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=WATK&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=26&GScntry=4&GSsr=161&GRid=5276254& (accessed March 24, 2017).
